Blog

Welcome to my blog. Recently, I have been attending a coding bootcamp, specifically for Web Design & Development. This site is used as a way to show what I have been learning about in the second half of the course, with each week having a different subject. These mostly consist of different areas of JavaScript, as this was the focus of the last 8 weeks.
